result.title: Anti-icing and superhydrophobic performance of passive layers
result.description: Report on antiicing and superhydrophobicperformance of the passive layers integrated in the multisAW devices Termination of multisAW devices consists of a antiicing layer providing an effective passive antiicing function The wetting the superhydrophilicity is related with antiicing capacity and antiicing properties of these layers will be examined correlated with the composition and microstructure and the results reported in this deliverable

result.title: Report on the optimum absorbent biochar and datasheet
result.description: This document will report the methodology and results of the lignin conversion to carbonized material by pyrolysis process. result.title: Draft report on optimized co-digestion process of residual fiber and juice residues
result.description: This document will report the methodology and results of the co-digestion experiments on the residual fiber and juice residues. The optimal ratio of the two fractions and loading of the co-digestion process will be determined in batch tests. Then the optimized co-digestion process will be tested in semi-continuous lab-scale reactors. optimal operation conditions like organic loading rate and hydraulic retention time of the biogas reactor will be reported.

result.title: Draft report on the scale-up of the transformation of lignin into pelletized biochar
result.description: This document will report the methodology and results of the pilot scale pyrolysis of the organosolv lignin into pelletized biochar. Fine-tuning will be performed using 0.1-1 kg batch Pilot equipment for fine-tuning of activation parameters guided by yield-performance trade-off.

result.title: Report/paper on optimisation of simple protein precipitation by acidification
result.description: This document will report the methodology and results of simple protein extraction from the green juice by chemical and microbial acidification. Protein characterisation, yield, stability, and feasibility will be reported.

result.title: Report on atomic scale excitation by (s)AWs
result.description: Report describing the atomic scale effects of SAW excitation of water molecules at icesubstrate interfaces This deliverable will gather main atomic simulation results of the effect of acoustic activation of water molecules at the interface with an oscillating substrate The way how the mechanical energy is transferred to the ice molecules the effect of this transfer in activating the water molecules leading eventually to their detachment from the substrate will be also reported in this deliverable together with expected effects of change the frequency of the oscillation its amplitude etc

result.title: Comparative analytical report (models)
result.description: GUF will coordinate the general comparative analysis it will investigate the existence of different models of tackling inwork poverty and the different schemes adopted to guarantee a minimum standard of living and a minimum set of social rights A final report containing the results of the comparative analysis D35 Comparative analytical report will be published and disseminate in a MidTerm Conference MTC on month 26
